connect20/onepica_avatax.name: connect20/OnePica_AvaTax

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/onepica_avatax.description: This extension integrates Magento with AvaTax, a tax service provided by Avalara. This will replace existing Magento-based, zipcode tax calculation with the more complex and centralized rules AvaTax provides.
